subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund reached the German Cup final by beating visiting Wolfsburg, 2-0. Bayern Munich hosts second-division Kaiserslautern in the second semifinal on Wednesday.
snippet: Borussia Dortmund reached the German Cup final by beating visiting Wolfsburg, 2-0. Bayern Munich hosts second-division Kaiserslautern in the second semifinal on Wednesday.
